dialogStrings: Cosmo Candle

{Barret}
Cosmo Canyon
This's where AVALANCHE was born{PAUSE}I promised my guys someday
when we saved the Planet
from the Shinra, that we'd all
go to Cosmo Canyon and celebrate{PAUSE}Biggs{OK}
Wedge{OK}
Jessie{OK}{PAUSE}Now they're all gone
died for the Planet.

{Barret}
Really?
To save the Planet?{PAUSE}We all
we all hate the Shinra{PAUSE}But is it right to go on?{PAUSE}Will they
will they ever forgive me?

{Barret}
Right now, I really don't know.
But I do know one thing.{PAUSE}If there's anything I can do,
to save the Planetor the people livin' on it
Then I'm gonna do it!{PAUSE}I don't care if it's for justice
or revenge, or whatever.
I don't care

{Barret}
Urrrrrgh!
I'm gonna do it!!

{Barret}
Again
AgainAVALANCHE's born again!

{Tifa}
{Cloud}{PAUSE}Bonfires are funny, aren't they?

They make you remember
all sorts of things.

{Tifa}
You know, {Cloud}.
five years ago

{Cloud}
?

{Tifa}
It's nothing.

{Tifa}
No, forget it.
I'm afraid to ask

{Cloud}
What is it?

{Tifa}
It feels like
it feels like you're going far away

{Tifa}
You really, really are
youright?

{Aeris}
I learned a lot.
The elders taught me many things.{PAUSE}About the Cetra
And the Promised Land

{Aeris}
I'malone
I'm all alone now

{Cloud}
But I'mwe're here for you, right?

{Aeris}
I know.
I know, but
I am the onlyCetra.

{Cloud}
Does that mean we can't help?
{Aeris}

{Yuffie}
What a boring place, just like I thought.
I wanna go somewhere!
Let's go find some Materia!

{Cait Sith}
I wonder how many years it's been
Gosh, it brings back memories

{Red XIII}
Long ago.

{Red XIII}
When I was still very small.
We were all around this flame

{Red XIII}
No, never mind

{Cloud}
What happened?

{Red XIII}
It's about my parents.{PAUSE}When I talk about my Mother,
I am full of pride and joy{PAUSE}And that's fine.
But when I think of my father,
my heart is full of anger

Bugenhagen
You really can't forgive your father?

{Red XIII}
Of course.
Heleft Mother for dead.

{Red XIII}
When the Gi tribe attacked,
he ran off by himself, leaving
Mother and the people of the Canyon!

Bugenhagen
Come, Nanaki.
There's something you should see.

{Red XIII}
?

Bugenhagen
The place may be dangerous.{PAUSE}{Cloud}.
Will you and one other person come with us?
{Red XIII}

{Barret}
Where're they going?

{Tifa}
Can I go too?

{Aeris}
I wonder what he wants to
show {Red XIII}?

{Cait Sith}
Dangerous?
Count me out

{Yuffie}
I wonder what he wants to show him? Hmm,
maybe it's Materia that's been
passed down for generations?

{Cloud}
Shall we get going?

{Aeris}
So this is it,
{Red XIII}

{Barret}
That's just the way it goes.
You came in handy at times

{Barret}
The buggy's fixed, so we can go now.

{Barret}
They said they finished fixin' the buggy.

{Barret}
{Tifa}
{Aeris}
{Cait Sith}
{Yuffie}

{Cloud}
{Red XIII}
Is Bugenhagen?

{Red XIII}
{PAUSE}Grandpa told me
that he's going away again!

{Cloud}
Away?

{Red XIII}
It seems like he really liked
that airship.{PAUSE}He told me he couldn't stay still
and just zipped out of here!

He even gave me a gift,
look!
Received "Limited Moon"!

{Red XIII}
Wait a minute. Aren't you supposed
to give gifts AFTER you come back?

Ha haGrandpa sure is strange!
Haaha haha

{Cloud}
Hmm
Maybe we'll run
into him again somewhere.

{Red XIII}
Yeah
maybe{PAUSE}Thanks, {Cloud}
